metadata.description: Professional Claude Code plugins for shell scripting, git workflows, browser automation, and development tools

plugins.name: bash-best-practices
plugins.description: Cross-platform Bash scripting with ShellCheck integration and tree-sitter function discovery

plugins.name: zsh-best-practices
plugins.description: macOS ZSH scripting best practices with automated function discovery

plugins.name: powershell-pragmatic
plugins.description: Production-ready PowerShell patterns with PSScriptAnalyzer integration

plugins.name: git-operations
plugins.description: Safe git operations with styleable commit messages and branch protection

plugins.name: git-worktree-tools
plugins.description: Git worktree lifecycle management with configuration syncing

plugins.name: branch-synchronizer
plugins.description: Intelligent branch sync with conflict-aware rebasing

plugins.name: playwright-mcp
plugins.description: Complete Playwright MCP toolkit for browser automation with Microsoft Edge

plugins.name: plugin-developer
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for creating and managing Claude Code plugins, skills, commands, agents, hooks, and marketplaces

plugins.name: reference-file-compactor
plugins.description: Optimize and compact skill reference files using validation-driven workflow

plugins.name: timing-matcher
plugins.description: Process large Timing app JSON exports to match unassigned activities to projects using pattern recognition and git correlation

plugins.name: youtube-music-updater
plugins.description: Update YouTube Music desktop app from GitHub releases
